name: Che Ba Mau (Three Color Dessert)
imgAlt: Vietnamese layered sweet dessert soup with beans, jelly, and coconut milk
instructions: Cook red beans with 2 cups water and 1/4 cup sugar until soft (about 25 min).
Cook mung beans separately with 1 cup water and remaining sugar until soft (about 15 min).
Mix coconut milk with salt, warm gently but don't boil.
Prepare pandan jelly according to package or make from scratch.
In serving glasses, layer mung beans at bottom.
Add a layer of red beans, then pandan jelly cubes.
Pour coconut milk over the layers.
Top with crushed ice and serve immediately.
